channel.title: Help pl0x
channel.description: well I'm using my own client (127.0.0.1) one and I'd like to play the game all by myself, but it seems when I log in like 3 mins later it logs off and wont let me back in :confused: :| I'd like toplay like this 'cause I want to finish some/all quests in the game. Also, when it lets me back in, I start without anything :| Help anybody?
